title: Trace route not even connecting to LoL servers?
body:
I have been having ping spikes every 10 - 15 seconds whilst playing (TPG...) and was suggested I do a trace route to the servers. For some reason the trace isn't even making it to the LoL servers? I have tried a few addresses as shown below:
Tracing route to 103.240.227.254 over a maximum of 20 hops

  1     1 ms     1 ms     1 ms  www.routerlogin.com [192.168.0.1] 
  2    17 ms    16 ms    16 ms  nme-sot-dry-bras1-lo-20.tpgi.com.au [10.20.20.187] 
  3    29 ms    31 ms    31 ms  syd-gls-har-dom1-be-20.tpgi.com.au [203.29.129.197] 
  4     *        *        *     Request timed out.
  5     *        *        *     Request timed out.
  6     *        *        *     Request timed out.
  7     *        *        *     Request timed out.
  8     *        *        *     Request timed out.
  9     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 10     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 11     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 12     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 13     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 14     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 15     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 16     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 17     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 18     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 19     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 20     *        *        *     Request timed out.

Trace complete.

and

tracert 103.240.226.249

Tracing route to 103.240.226.249 over a maximum of 30 hops

  1     2 ms     2 ms     2 ms  www.routerlogin.com [192.168.0.1]
  2    18 ms    18 ms    17 ms  nme-sot-dry-bras1-lo-20.tpgi.com.au
  3    35 ms    38 ms    35 ms  syd-gls-har-dom1-be-20.tpgi.com.au
  4     *        *     ^C

Am I using the wrong address or something?

replies.body: Yeah those addresses don't work for me. The one I have been testing is oce.leagueoflegends.com. I don't think it's the exact server address, but it's the address of this website, and is close enough for me. Because I am getting terrible ping spikes with TPG, ever since Cyclone Marcia 3 or so weeks ago. I used to have 50 stable ping. Now, it's really bad, it will go from 60- 600+ very frequently, I cannot play any game properly. Even in a custom 'cs practice' game it will still spike to 300+

Might wanna remove your IP and user-name from that. People can do evil things with those.

I've tried doing this myself, and I didn't get ANY response. League works perfectly fine for me, by the way. Not too sure how much a merit a trace-route actually has anymore.

That formatting lol.

Have you tried closing all other applications while running League?
could be DNS issue or firewall but try turning your firewall off completely then run lol see if it works then its your firewall

your not using the wrong address if you look at the above information you are able to leave your home network your actually making it to your exchange in sydney so the issue isnt yours try pinging the servers or using Ping plotter to see whats going on

C:\Users\Harrison>ping 103.240.227.254

Pinging 103.240.227.254 with 32 bytes of data:
Request timed out.
Request timed out.
Request timed out.
Request timed out.

Ping statistics for 103.240.227.254:
    Packets: Sent = 4, Received = 0, Lost = 4 (100% loss),

These are the results I got make any sense to you?
